Chapter 1858 - Talk Of Spiritual Desolation Mountain

Lin Feng was completely immersed in memories. “Eldest Senior Apprentice Brother even felt that Master had severed all worldly attachments. He was alone, above it all and detached from the world. Others could only gaze upon him from afar, but none could truly get close to him.”

He fell briefly silent before adding, “I often felt that everything in this world was beneath Master’s notice. Eldest Senior Apprentice Brother said that Master had become that way because he was deeply lonely…”

Su Yi pursed his lips thoughtfully. His fifth incarnation seemed like a passerby, void of attachments. He was mysterious and transcendent, and not even his disciples could really get close to him.

“But Master was the kindest to us,” said Lin Feng, his tone suddenly staunch. “He left his mantle for us on Spiritual Desolation Mountain without the slightest selfishness, as well as all of the treasures he’d acquired over the years. Moreover, he never demanded anything of us whatsoever!

“As I told you, before Master left the Immortal Realm, he even gave each of us one of the four Mysteries of Chaos he acquired...
